info.title: SportsData API
info.description: The William Hill SportsData REST API is a collection of GET methods to provide William Hill product data such as sport, competition, event, market and selection data (including prices).

get.summary: Retrieves a list of competitions for a given class id.
get.description: Retrieves a list of competitions for a given class id.

parameters.name: apiKey
parameters.description: Your API Key available from your developer portal

parameters.name: classId
parameters.description: The class id to retrieve information for.

parameters.name: isPublished
parameters.description: Specify whether only active entities should be returned, according to the William Hill definition of active

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Specify an absolute field list to return (Comma-Separated List)

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Specify fields in addition to the default to return (Comma-Separated List)

parameters.name: exclude
parameters.description: Specify fields from the default to exclude (Comma-Separated List)

parameters.name: displayed
parameters.description: Specify whether to return displayed entities or not

parameters.name: channel
parameters.description: Specify a channel filter and only results from that channel will be returned

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Specify a status to filter results by. This is currently A (active) or S (suspended)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: The field to order the response by, followed by the order. For example: name,desc

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Skip over a number of elements by specifying a start value for the query

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Specify the number of results to return

parameters.name: culture
parameters.description: Code used to return responses in language other than English, acceptable values are en-GB|de-DE|es-ES|fr-FR|nn-NO|fi-FI|ru-RU|pt-PT|hu-HU|sl-SL|ga-IE|en-CA|sr-Latn|sv-SE|el=GR|zh-CHS|it-IT|zh-CHT|cs-CZ|de-AT|ja-JP|pl-PL|da-DK|ro-RO|nl-NL|tr-TR

get.summary: Retrieves a list of events for a given class id.
get.description: Retrieves a list of events for a given class id. 'includeAllDescendants' parameter should be accompanied with 'date' filter or one of 'dateFrom' and 'dateTo' filters.

parameters.name: apiKey
parameters.description: Your API Key available from your developer portal

parameters.name: classId
parameters.description: The class id to retrieve information for.

parameters.name: isPublished
parameters.description: Specify whether only active entities should be returned, according to the William Hill definition of active

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Specify an absolute field list to return (Comma-Separated List)

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Specify fields in addition to the default to return (Comma-Separated List)

parameters.name: exclude
parameters.description: Specify fields from the default to exclude (Comma-Separated List)

parameters.name: displayed
parameters.description: Specify whether to return displayed entities or not

parameters.name: channel
parameters.description: Specify a channel filter and only results from that channel will be returned

parameters.name: settled
parameters.description: Specify wether only settled entities should be returned

parameters.name: includeEmpty
parameters.description: When declared as false it should exclude markets and events that have no selections / markets

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Specify a status to filter results by. This is currently A (active) or S (suspended)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: The field to order the response by, followed by the order. For example: name,desc

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Skip over a number of elements by specifying a start value for the query

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Specify the number of results to return

parameters.name: headlineSummary
parameters.description: Return only headline markets (Markets with the lowest display order) Either 1 InPlay and 1 Pre-Match, or the amount specified in marketCount, if available. Markets and Outcomes will be returned.

parameters.name: includeAllDescendants
parameters.description: Include every descendant in the below heirarchy

parameters.name: isInPlay
parameters.description: Show only events that are in-play

parameters.name: marketCount
parameters.description: Specify the number of markets to return when requesting headlineSummary. This count of InPlay and Pre-Match markets will be returned.For example, when specifying 1, 1 In Play and 1 Pre Match market will be returned.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Return only events for the specified date (yyyy-MM-dd).

parameters.name: dateFrom
parameters.description: The UTC datetime from the events to be returned. (yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss)

parameters.name: dateTo
parameters.description: The UTC datetime TO the events to be returned. (yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss)

parameters.name: eventSort
parameters.description: Filter event by event sort

parameters.name: culture
parameters.description: Code used to return responses in language other than English, acceptable values are en-GB|de-DE|es-ES|fr-FR|nn-NO|fi-FI|ru-RU|pt-PT|hu-HU|sl-SL|ga-IE|en-CA|sr-Latn|sv-SE|el=GR|zh-CHS|it-IT|zh-CHT|cs-CZ|de-AT|ja-JP|pl-PL|da-DK|ro-RO|nl-NL|tr-TR

parameters.name: marketPublished
parameters.description: Specify whether only active entities should be returned, according to the William Hill definition of active

parameters.name: marketStatus
parameters.description: Specify a status to filter results by. This is currently A (active) or S (suspended)

parameters.name: marketDisplayed
parameters.description: Specify whether to return displayed entities or not

parameters.name: marketChannel
parameters.description: Specify a channel filter and only results from that channel will be returned

parameters.name: marketSort
parameters.description: Filter by market sort (e.g. MR (match result) -- (Outright)).

parameters.name: marketEW
parameters.description: Specify whether to return markets with each way betting or those without

parameters.name: selectionStatus
parameters.description: Specify a status to filter results by. This is currently A (active) or S (suspended)

parameters.name: selectionChannel
parameters.description: Specify a channel filter and only results from that channel will be returned

parameters.name: selectionPublished
parameters.description: Specify whether only active entities should be returned, according to the William Hill definition of active

parameters.name: apiKey
parameters.description: Your API Key available from your developer portal

parameters.name: competitionId
parameters.description: The competition id to retrieve information for.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Specify an absolute field list to return (Comma-Separated List)

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Specify fields in addition to the default to return (Comma-Separated List)

parameters.name: exclude
parameters.description: Specify fields from the default to exclude (Comma-Separated List)

parameters.name: culture
parameters.description: Code used to return responses in language other than English, acceptable values are en-GB|de-DE|es-ES|fr-FR|nn-NO|fi-FI|ru-RU|pt-PT|hu-HU|sl-SL|ga-IE|en-CA|sr-Latn|sv-SE|el=GR|zh-CHS|it-IT|zh-CHT|cs-CZ|de-AT|ja-JP|pl-PL|da-DK|ro-RO|nl-NL|tr-TR

get.summary: Retrieves a list of events for a given competition id.

parameters.description: Your API Key available from your developer portal

parameters.name: competitionId
parameters.description: The competition id to retrieve information for.

parameters.description: Specify whether only active entities should be returned, according to the William Hill definition of active

parameters.name: exclude
parameters.description: Specify fields from the default to exclude (Comma-Separated List)

parameters.description: Specify whether to return displayed entities or not

parameters.description: Specify a channel filter and only results from that channel will be returned

parameters.name: settled
parameters.description: Specify wether only settled entities should be returned

parameters.name: includeEmpty
parameters.description: When declared as false it should exclude markets and events that have no selections / markets

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Specify a status to filter results by. This is currently A (active) or S (suspended)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: The field to order the response by, followed by the order. For example: name,desc

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Skip over a number of elements by specifying a start value for the query

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Specify the number of results to return

parameters.name: headlineSummary
parameters.description: Return only headline markets (Markets with the lowest display order) Either 1 InPlay and 1 Pre-Match, or the amount specified in marketCount, if available. Markets and Outcomes will be returned.

parameters.name: includeAllDescendants
parameters.description: Include every descendant in the below heirarchy

parameters.name: isInPlay
parameters.description: Show only events that are in-play

parameters.name: marketCount
parameters.description: Specify the number of markets to return when requesting headlineSummary. This count of InPlay and Pre-Match markets will be returned.For example, when specifying 1, 1 In Play and 1 Pre Match market will be returned.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Return only events for the specified date (yyyy-MM-dd).

parameters.name: dateFrom
parameters.description: The UTC datetime from the events to be returned. (yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss)

parameters.name: dateTo
parameters.description: The UTC datetime TO the events to be returned. (yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss)

parameters.name: marketGroupId
parameters.description: Filter by marketGroupId (e.g. OB_MG1276585).

parameters.name: eventSort
parameters.description: Filter event by event sort

parameters.name: culture
parameters.description: Code used to return responses in language other than English, acceptable values are en-GB|de-DE|es-ES|fr-FR|nn-NO|fi-FI|ru-RU|pt-PT|hu-HU|sl-SL|ga-IE|en-CA|sr-Latn|sv-SE|el=GR|zh-CHS|it-IT|zh-CHT|cs-CZ|de-AT|ja-JP|pl-PL|da-DK|ro-RO|nl-NL|tr-TR

parameters.name: marketPublished
parameters.description: Specify whether only active entities should be returned, according to the William Hill definition of active

parameters.name: marketStatus
parameters.description: Specify a status to filter results by. This is currently A (active) or S (suspended)

parameters.name: marketDisplayed
parameters.description: Specify whether to return displayed entities or not

parameters.name: marketChannel
parameters.description: Specify a channel filter and only results from that channel will be returned

parameters.name: marketSort
parameters.description: Filter by market sort (e.g. MR (match result) -- (Outright)).

parameters.name: marketEW
parameters.description: Specify whether to return markets with each way betting or those without

parameters.name: selectionStatus
parameters.description: Specify a status to filter results by. This is currently A (active) or S (suspended)

parameters.name: selectionChannel
parameters.description: Specify a channel filter and only results from that channel will be returned

parameters.name: selectionPublished

get.summary: Retrieves competitors for a single event by ID.
get.description: Retrieves competitors for a single event by ID.

parameters.name: apiKey
parameters.description: Your API Key available from your developer portal

parameters.name: eventId
parameters.description: The event ID to retrieve information for.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Specify an absolute field list to return (Comma-Separated List)

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Specify fields in addition to the default to return (Comma-Separated List)

parameters.name: exclude
parameters.description: Specify fields from the default to exclude (Comma-Separated List)

application/json.example:
{
 "competitors": 
 [
 {
 "id": "1",
 "name": "Springer Dinger",
 "age": "3",
 "drawNumber": "4",
 "jockeyName": "Atzeni, A",
 "weightPounds": "134",
 "silkImageUrl": "http://whdn.williamhill.com/content/sportsbook/silks/55336.gif",
 "trainerName": "Varian, R",
 "ownerName": "Sheikh Mohammed Obaid Al Maktoum"
 "colour": "grey",
 "sex": "Male",
 "formGuide": "4-2711",
 "rating": "27",
 "overview":
 {
 "runner":"Good pedigree; took him five times to click but won his Lingfield novice nicely in the end and duly confirmed himself progressive by following up at Newmarket, again over 7f (good ground); pace was true there so form looks okay and rates a danger to all off 6lb higher."
 "sire":"top-class 2yo over 6-7f inc Phoenix S. Lagardere; sire of Group winners; good record with fillies",
 }
 ]
}

get.summary: Gets one or more specific markets
get.description: Retrieves one or more specific markets. Markets with Live at the end are always In-Play markets. However, not ALL In-Play markets have Live at the end of the market name.

parameters.name: apiKey
parameters.description: Your API Key available from your developer portal

parameters.name: eventId
parameters.description: The event ID to retrieve information for.

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of selectionIds

parameters.name: includeAllDescendants
parameters.description: Include every descendant in the below heirarchy

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Specify an absolute field list to return (Comma-Separated List)

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Specify fields in addition to the default to return (Comma-Separated List)

parameters.name: exclude
parameters.description: Specify fields from the default to exclude (Comma-Separated List)

parameters.name: includeEmpty
parameters.description: When declared as false it should exclude markets and events that have no selections / markets

parameters.name: culture
parameters.description: Code used to return responses in language other than English, acceptable values are en-GB|de-DE|es-ES|fr-FR|nn-NO|fi-FI|ru-RU|pt-PT|hu-HU|sl-SL|ga-IE|en-CA|sr-Latn|sv-SE|el=GR|zh-CHS|it-IT|zh-CHT|cs-CZ|de-AT|ja-JP|pl-PL|da-DK|ro-RO|nl-NL|tr-TR

parameters.name: marketPublished
parameters.description: Specify whether only active entities should be returned, according to the William Hill definition of active

parameters.name: marketStatus
parameters.description: Specify a status to filter results by. This is currently A (active) or S (suspended)

parameters.name: marketDisplayed
parameters.description: Specify whether to return displayed entities or not

parameters.name: marketChannel
parameters.description: Specify a channel filter and only results from that channel will be returned

parameters.name: marketSort
parameters.description: Filter by market sort (e.g. MR (match result) -- (Outright)).

parameters.name: marketEW
parameters.description: Specify whether to return markets with each way betting or those without

parameters.name: selectionStatus
parameters.description: Specify a status to filter results by. This is currently A (active) or S (suspended)

parameters.name: selectionChannel
parameters.description: Specify a channel filter and only results from that channel will be returned

parameters.name: selectionPublished
parameters.description: Specify whether only active entities should be returned, according to the William Hill definition of active

parameters.name: displayed
parameters.description: Specify whether to return displayed entities or not

parameters.name: channel
parameters.description: Specify a channel filter and only results from that channel will be returned

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Specify a status to filter results by. This is currently A (active) or S (suspended)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: The field to order the response by, followed by the order. For example: name,desc

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Skip over a number of elements by specifying a start value for the query

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Specify the number of results to return

parameters.name: culture
parameters.description: Code used to return responses in language other than English, acceptable values are en-GB|de-DE|es-ES|fr-FR|nn-NO|fi-FI|ru-RU|pt-PT|hu-HU|sl-SL|ga-IE|en-CA|sr-Latn|sv-SE|el=GR|zh-CHS|it-IT|zh-CHT|cs-CZ|de-AT|ja-JP|pl-PL|da-DK|ro-RO|nl-NL|tr-TR

get.summary: Retrieves a weighted list of Selections.
get.description: Retrieves a weighted list of Selections.

parameters.name: apiKey
parameters.description: Your API Key available from your developer portal

parameters.name: sportIds
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of sportsIds for which to retrieve topBets for

parameters.name: competitionIds
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of competitionIds for which to retrieve topBets for

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Specify the number of results to return

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Specify an absolute field list to return (Comma-Separated List)

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Specify fields in addition to the default to return (Comma-Separated List)

parameters.name: exclude
parameters.description: Specify fields from the default to exclude (Comma-Separated List)

parameters.name: param_topBetEventId
parameters.description: The event ID to retrieve top bet information for. Multiple events up to 5 may be used

parameters.name: sortName
parameters.description: The market sort code used to further filter event results. Please note this can only be used with event id(s).

parameters.name: culture
parameters.description: Code used to return responses in language other than English, acceptable values are en-GB|de-DE|es-ES|fr-FR|nn-NO|fi-FI|ru-RU|pt-PT|hu-HU|sl-SL|ga-IE|en-CA|sr-Latn|sv-SE|el=GR|zh-CHS|it-IT|zh-CHT|cs-CZ|de-AT|ja-JP|pl-PL|da-DK|ro-RO|nl-NL|tr-TR

parameters.name: Locale
parameters.description: Code used to select a set of top bets settings, default is "whapi" which allows events set in far future to be included, setting the value to "en-GB" will activate english sportsbook settings, mirroring top bets on the website, which restricts events returned to those taking place in next 36 hours. Acceptable values (not all heve their own settings - if none currently available for that locale - en-GB will be used) are de-DE|whapi|en-GB|es-ES|fr-FR|nn-NO|fi-FI|ru-RU|pt-PT|hu-HU|sl-SL|ga-IE|en-CA|sr-Latn|sv-SE|el=GR|zh-CHS|it-IT|zh-CHT|cs-CZ|de-AT|ja-JP|pl-PL|da-DK|ro-RO|nl-NL|tr-TR

isPublished.description: Indicates if the item is published

status.description: Indicates if the class is (A)ctive or (S)uspended

betInRunningDelay.description: Delay in seconds between bet being sent and bet being placed

cashinAvailable.description: Indicates whether cashin is available on the events of this competition

channels.description: A list of channels that apply to this competition

displayed.description: Whether the competition should be displayed or not

flags.description: A list of flags that apply to this competition

isPublished.description: Indicates if the item is published or not

order.description: The display order of the competition

parentIds.description: A list of IDs of parent entities

status.description: The status of the competition (A for Active, S for Suspended)

colour.description: The colour of the horse (There are 5 colours. b = Bay. bl = Black. br = Brown. ch = Chestnut. gr = Grey)

drawNumber.description: The stall number that the horse is allocated and will start from

formGuide.description: The form of a horse is a record of significant events, mainly its performance in previous races. For example: The value 874-1 means that the horse finished 8th, then 7th in the next race, then 4th, hyphen here means he did not finish in the race, and was 1st in the last race he was running in.

id.description: Unique identifier of the competitor in the event

jockeyName.description: The name of the Jockey who's riding the horse

name.description: The name of competitor that the information is being given for

overview.description: Additional information about the horse's performance

ownerName.description: The name of the horses owner(s)

rating.description: The rating of the horse which is defined by a rating provider. It represents the horse's performance (the higher the rating, the better the horse is)

silkImageUrl.description: The URL for the image that represents the 'silk' (Coathing pattern) worn by the jockey.

trainerName.description: The name of the horses trainer

code.description: The William Hill API Error Code

field.description: Optional field to point to the field with an error

betInRunningDelay.description: Delay in seconds between bet being sent and bet being placed

cashinAvailable.description: Whether cashin is available on this event

channels.description: A list of channels that apply to this event

country.description: A string indicating the country code of this event if available

displayed.description: whether the event should be displayed or not

eventSort.description: What type of event is this? (e.g. MTCH, TRNMT)

flags.description: A list of flags that apply to this event

hasInPlayMarkets.description: Whether this event has inplay markets

hasLivePrices.description: Whether this event has Live Prices

isInPlay.description: Whether this event has started and therefore is inplay

isPublished.description: Indicates if the item is published

marketCountActiveInPlay.description: Count of active markets in play

markets.description: A list of markets belonging to this event

parentIds.description: A list of IDs of parent entities

settled.description: Whether the event has been settled

startDateTime.description: The start date and time of the event

status.description: Status of the event (A for Active, S for Suspended)

channels.description: A channel indicates where an entry can be accessed. Its made up of a string containing a number of characters

displayed.description: Indicates if the item should be displayed

eachWay.description: Indicates if each way betting is available

eachWayFactorDen.description:
Where each way terms are stored with the bet, this holds the denominator for the each way
factor. For example, if the each way terms are: 5 places pay , this value will be 4

eachWayFactorNum.description:
Where each way terms are stored with the bet, this holds the numerator for the each way
factor. For example, if the each way terms are: 5 places pay , this value will be 1

eachWayPlaces.description:
Where each way terms are stored with the bet, this holds the number of places paid. For
example, if the each way terms are: 5 places pay , this value will be 5

hcapValue.description: This value indicates the current handicap set on the Event Market, assuming it has a handicap type.

id.description: ID (e.g. OB_MA{id} (e.g. OB_MA1), OB_SP (Sport), OB_CL (Class), OB_TY (Competition / type), OB_EV (event) OB_MA (Market), OB_OU (Selection / outcome)

isPublished.description: Indicates if the item is published

marketGroupCollectionId.description: The collectionId of the Market Group inherited from

marketGroupId.description: The group id the market was inherited from

marketGroupName.description: The group name the market was inherited from

marketSort.description: The sort defines the market template

parentIds.description: A list of IDs of parent entities

selections.description: A list of selections belonging to the market

settled.description: Whether the market is settled or not

status.description: Indicates the status of the Market (A = Active/S = Suspended)

collectionId.description: The collectionId of the Market Group, If it has one

competitionId.description: The CompetitionId of the Market Group

id.description: The Id of the Market Group

marketSort.description: The market sort of this group

name.description: The Name of the Market Group

decimal.description: The decimal format of the price

fractional.description: The fractional format of the price or EVS when the price evens.

channels.description: A list of channels that applies to this selection

csAway.description: The away score in a correct score event

csHome.description: The home score in a correct score event

displayed.description: Wether this selection should be displayed or not

isPublished.description: Indicates if the item is published

oddsDecimal.description: The selection price, in decimal format

oddsFractional.description: The selection price, in fractional format

order.description: The display order of the selection

parentIds.description: A list of IDs of parent entities

runnerNum.description: The runner number in race events

settled.description: Wether this selection has been settled or not

status.description: The status of the selection (A for Active or S for Suspended)

isPublished.description: Indicates if the item is published

weight.description: The weighting of the bet in the Top bets ranking

param_active.name: isPublished
param_active.description: Specify whether only active entities should be returned, according to the William Hill definition of active

param_apiKey.name: apiKey
param_apiKey.description: Your API Key available from your developer portal

param_channel.name: channel
param_channel.description: Specify a channel filter and only results from that channel will be returned

param_classId.name: classId
param_classId.description: The class id to retrieve information for.

param_competitionId.name: competitionId
param_competitionId.description: The competition id to retrieve information for.

param_competitionIds.name: competitionIds
param_competitionIds.description: A comma-separated list of competitionIds for which to retrieve topBets for

param_culture.name: culture
param_culture.description: Code used to return responses in language other than English, acceptable values are en-GB|de-DE|es-ES|fr-FR|nn-NO|fi-FI|ru-RU|pt-PT|hu-HU|sl-SL|ga-IE|en-CA|sr-Latn|sv-SE|el=GR|zh-CHS|it-IT|zh-CHT|cs-CZ|de-AT|ja-JP|pl-PL|da-DK|ro-RO|nl-NL|tr-TR

param_date.name: date
param_date.description: Return only events for the specified date (yyyy-MM-dd).

param_dateFrom.name: dateFrom
param_dateFrom.description: The UTC datetime from the events to be returned. (yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss)

param_dateTo.name: dateTo
param_dateTo.description: The UTC datetime TO the events to be returned. (yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss)

param_displayed.name: displayed
param_displayed.description: Specify whether to return displayed entities or not

param_eventId.name: eventId
param_eventId.description: The event ID to retrieve information for.

param_exclude.name: exclude
param_exclude.description: Specify fields from the default to exclude (Comma-Separated List)

param_fields.name: fields
param_fields.description: Specify an absolute field list to return (Comma-Separated List)

param_headlinesummary.name: headlineSummary
param_headlinesummary.description: Return only headline markets (Markets with the lowest display order) Either 1 InPlay and 1 Pre-Match, or the amount specified in marketCount, if available. Markets and Outcomes will be returned.

param_include.name: include
param_include.description: Specify fields in addition to the default to return (Comma-Separated List)

param_includeAllDescendants.name: includeAllDescendants
param_includeAllDescendants.description: Include every descendant in the below heirarchy

param_includeEmpty.name: includeEmpty
param_includeEmpty.description: When declared as false it should exclude markets and events that have no selections / markets

param_isInPlay.name: isInPlay
param_isInPlay.description: Show only events that are in-play

param_limit.name: limit
param_limit.description: Specify the number of results to return

param_locale.name: Locale
param_locale.description: Code used to select a set of top bets settings, default is "whapi" which allows events set in far future to be included, setting the value to "en-GB" will activate english sportsbook settings, mirroring top bets on the website, which restricts events returned to those taking place in next 36 hours. Acceptable values (not all heve their own settings - if none currently available for that locale - en-GB will be used) are de-DE|whapi|en-GB|es-ES|fr-FR|nn-NO|fi-FI|ru-RU|pt-PT|hu-HU|sl-SL|ga-IE|en-CA|sr-Latn|sv-SE|el=GR|zh-CHS|it-IT|zh-CHT|cs-CZ|de-AT|ja-JP|pl-PL|da-DK|ro-RO|nl-NL|tr-TR

param_marketChannel.name: marketChannel
param_marketChannel.description: Specify a channel filter and only results from that channel will be returned

param_marketCount.name: marketCount
param_marketCount.description: Specify the number of markets to return when requesting headlineSummary. This count of InPlay and Pre-Match markets will be returned.For example, when specifying 1, 1 In Play and 1 Pre Match market will be returned.

param_marketDisplayed.name: marketDisplayed
param_marketDisplayed.description: Specify whether to return displayed entities or not

param_marketEW.name: marketEW
param_marketEW.description: Specify whether to return markets with each way betting or those without

param_marketId.name: marketId
param_marketId.description: The market id to retrieve information for

param_marketIds.name: marketIds
param_marketIds.description: Comma-seaerated list of market IDs to filter by

param_marketPublished.name: marketPublished
param_marketPublished.description: Specify whether only active entities should be returned, according to the William Hill definition of active

param_marketSort.name: marketSort
param_marketSort.description: Filter by market sort (e.g. MR (match result) -- (Outright)).

param_marketSort2.name: marketSort
param_marketSort2.description: Filter by market sort (e.g. MR (match result) -- (Outright)).

param_marketStatus.name: marketStatus
param_marketStatus.description: Specify a status to filter results by. This is currently A (active) or S (suspended)

param_offset.name: offset
param_offset.description: Skip over a number of elements by specifying a start value for the query

param_selectionChannel.name: selectionChannel
param_selectionChannel.description: Specify a channel filter and only results from that channel will be returned

param_selectionPublished.name: selectionPublished
param_selectionPublished.description: Specify whether only active entities should be returned, according to the William Hill definition of active

param_selectionStatus.name: selectionStatus
param_selectionStatus.description: Specify a status to filter results by. This is currently A (active) or S (suspended)

param_settled.name: settled
param_settled.description: Specify wether only settled entities should be returned

param_sort.name: sort
param_sort.description: The field to order the response by, followed by the order. For example: name,desc

param_sortName.name: sortName
param_sortName.description: The market sort code used to further filter event results. Please note this can only be used with event id(s).

param_sportId.name: sportId
param_sportId.description: The sport id to retrieve information for.

param_sportIds.name: sportIds
param_sportIds.description: A comma-separated list of sportsIds for which to retrieve topBets for

param_status.name: status
param_status.description: Specify a status to filter results by. This is currently A (active) or S (suspended)

param_topBetEventId.name: param_topBetEventId
param_topBetEventId.description: The event ID to retrieve top bet information for. Multiple events up to 5 may be used
